casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Neal DUKE. No. 57A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 10, 2005. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, G. Patrick Murphy, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, Mikko Red Arrow, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of May 2005 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of May 2005."
